definition: cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem

sentences.english: KuangFu Panda is an interesting movie.
sentences.chinese: 翻译{KuangFu大猫熊是一有趣的movie。

sentences.english: Female panda Ying Hua plays in a tyre at the Beijing Zoo.
sentences.chinese: 女猫熊瑛华在北京动物园玩轮胎。

sentences.english: To pick a panda or a kitten … tough call.
sentences.chinese: 猫熊跟小猫都好可爱喔，真难拿定主意。

sentences.english: A six-month-old Wet Panda walks across a tree branch at the Munich zoo.
sentences.chinese: 慕尼黑动物园中一只六个月大的小猫熊在树枝上散步。

sentences.english: Because Sichuan is hometown of our country national treasure pandas, bamboo planter very many.
sentences.chinese: 由于四川是我国国宝猫熊之故乡，竹子种植甚多。

sentences.english: This panda is old and fat.
The newborn is the first red panda to be born at the zoo in 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 这只幼熊是15年来在动物园降生的第一只红猫熊。

sentences.english: Equip: Increases attack power by 556 in Cat, Bear, Dire Bear, and Moonkin forms only.
sentences.chinese: 在猫熊巨熊和枭兽形态提高556点攻击强度。

sentences.english: The little cat bear felt itself a bit funny.
One 'Olympic Pandas' tries to snatch carrot from his pal.
sentences.chinese: 北京动物园的奥运猫熊抢夺胡萝卜。

sentences.english: The pool is full of cool koalas and poor pandas.
sentences.chinese: 池子了满满的都是冷静的无尾熊和可怜的猫熊。

sentences.english: The pandas received a Royal welcome in Madrid.
sentences.chinese: 猫熊在马德里接受皇室般的欢迎。
猫熊是濒临绝种的一种物种。

sentences.english: A little bear and a little cat bear met with each other in a forest when they went to travel in America.
sentences.chinese: 小狗熊和小猫熊到美洲旅游时，在一个森林里相遇了。

sentences.english: Is the panda related to the bear?

definition: Garfield (comic strip cat created by Jim Davis)
